title: 4 Ways To Live A Healthier & Longer Life EP 1134
description:
The most important thing you can do for your future self is to take control of your health.

In this episode, Lewis and the guests discuss what you need to do to live longer, how we can prevent and treat chronic diseases by changing our diets, how food affects our brain, the main causes of cancer and what we do about it and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1134

Previous episodes of each guest:

Dr. Steven Gundry: www.lewishowes.com/521

Dr. Mark Hyman: www.lewishowes.com/916

Dr. Lisa Mosconi: www.lewishowes.com/1091

Dr. Jason Fung: www.lewishowes.com/1030 & www.lewishowes.com/1031
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
